alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:23PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Worcester and east central Hampden Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 622 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sturbridge, or 19 miles southwest of Worcester, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Grafton, Webster, Southbridge, Auburn, Northbridge, Oxford, Uxbridge, Millbury, Charlton, Spencer, Dudley, Leicester, Thompson, Sturbridge, Sutton, Douglas, Woodstock, Warren, Brimfield and Brookfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
